event.message:
The Windows Storage Provider could not start the remote storage subsystem.
Storage Subsystem ID: %1 Storage Subsystem URI: %2 Username: %3 Error Code: %4 Error String: %5
Ensure that the remote storage subsystem is online and connected to the network. Check if the user attempting to connect to the subsystem has the necessary permissions.
The Windows Storage Provider has lost its connection to the cluster.
The Windows Storage Provider has established a connection to the cluster.
